items.sentence: We don't live in Australia. We're just visiting.
Have you ever taken a bath with your clothes on?
Tom and Mary spent yesterday afternoon together.
I hope that this isn't the last time we see you.
I think that that would be too much to hope for.
Tom was the one who inspired me to learn French.
The three boys opened the doors of the building.
The United States is in the Northern Hemisphere.
Who's that woman I saw you with the other night?
You don't have to use such a harsh tone with me.
